script.name: Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.Pirate.Base.AI.Name
script.description: Pirate Guild - Base AI : Set Name

line.comment: * Dynamically rename pirate bases, add or remove shields, calculate a special offer
* Added (Nicoman35): Dynamic shield management dependent on difficulty and pirate base type
* Install or uninstall shields according to base type and difficulty
* Store number of additional installed 2 GJ Shields (for plugin deinstallation purpouses)

line.text: ' has a maximum allowed shield count of '
